BIO

Born and raised in Columbus, Ohio I developed a (mostly) healthy obsession with taking things apart, putting them back together and constantly improving.

I have been living, working and traveling across Southeast Asia for approximately 5 years. I choose a lifestyle that is lean on possessions yet rich with experiences.
